title: gotour binary in wrong folder for local install
body:
by **johan.samyn**: 
Go version: 1.0.2
Platform: Win7 (32bit)
I just installed the new gotour locally (using the 'go get' command mentioned in the
'Gotour offline' page). But I found out the gotour.exe was copied in the wrong folder.
Apparently the installation uses "%GOROOT%bin" as the installation folder,
causing the exe to be installed in a new subfolder "%GOROOT%bin" of whatever
folder your are in when executing the go get command. I had to manually move the exe
into the correct %GOROOT%\bin" folder. So the problem appears to be the lacking
"\" in the destination foldername for the exe.
